alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 9:56AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bourbon, northeastern Crawford and western Vernon Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 956 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bronson to near Redfield. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Scott, Marmaton, Uniontown, Bronaugh, Fulton, Redfield, Hepler, Moundville, Richards, Mapleton, Deerfield, Stotesbury, Harding, Pawnee Station, Hiattville, Petersburg, Hammond, Devon, Garland and Xenia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
